root.name: Commander Keen 2: The Earth Explodes
root.description: Series In the game you play the role of Commander Keen: the alter-ego of an eight year-old genius by the name of Billy Blaze. When Billy learns that the Earth is in danger, he dons his brother's football helmet and his homemade interstellar spaceship to become Commander Keen -- Defender of the Earth! This is the second of three episodes. PC System Requirements Minimum: A 100% Windows 2000/XP/Vista-compatible computer system
